text:
Version Control


Git is NOT GitHub
Git is NOT GitHub
Git is NOT GitHub
Git is NOT GitHub
Git is NOT GitHub

Version Control Systems

git
SVN
CVS
mercurial

Git Platforms (git + web GUI + PM tools)

GitHub
GitLab
Bitbucket

gitea is a self-hosted service (run a platform on your own server).

Documentation, Content Aggregators, e.g., CTV, Python Graph Gallery
big book of R
Stackoverflow.com
